modName: Kijami and Nijami - Cute Female Khajiit Save - Lvl 1
summary:
4 Savegames of female Khajiits, Lvl 1 - located near Riverwood.

Ki'jami (coming in 2 different versions) escaped with Imperial,
Ni'jami (coming in a modded and in an un-modded version) escaped with Stormcloak.
descriptionHtml:
Ki'jami and Ni'jami are cute and natural looking female Khajiits at lvl 1. Ki'jami escaped Helgen with Hadvar the Imperial and Ni'jami escaped with Ralof the Stormcloak.

You will find yourself located at the Guardian Stones near Riverwood.



Download the file and unzip it to your Saves folder: DocumentsMyGamesSkyrimSaves.
If you like to modify her just type showracemenu in the console.


[u]Ki'jami Version 1:[/u]

Escaped with Imperial.

No mods are required to play Ki'jami. I only recommend [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5941]Coverkhajiits[/url] for high res textures of Khajiit faces.



[u]Ki'jami Version 2:[/u] Saved with Skyrim version 1.5

Escaped with Imperial.

I used the listed mods to improve the look of Ki'jami. Of course you can play her without any mods but if you wanna see her ingame like on my screens I recommend using:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5941]Coverkhajiits[/url] (high res face texture)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168]Apachii SkyHair[/url] (Dreadlocks)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14713]More Hair Colors[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6956]More accurate Khajiit chin and lips paint[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11371]83Willows WHITER TEETH 4all[/url]



[u]Ni'jami Version 1:[/u] Saved with Skyrim version 1.7 (without Dawnguard and Hearthfire)

Escaped with Stormcloak.

I used the listed mods to improve the look of Ni'jami. Of course you can play her without any mods but if you wanna see her ingame like on my screens I recommend using:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5941]Coverkhajiits[/url] (high res face texture)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168]Apachii SkyHair[/url] (Dreadlocks)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6956]More accurate Khajiit chin and lips paint[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11371]83Willows WHITER TEETH 4all[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8624]Khajiit Earrings[/url]



[u]Ni'jami Version 2:[/u] Saved with Skyrim version 1.7 (without Dawnguard and Hearthfire)

Escaped with Stormcloak. Clean Savegame without any mods.
author: Finduilas80
